name: Meftal Spas
description: Meftal Spas is commonly used to relieve pain and discomfort caused by muscle spasms, especially in the abdomen.

name: Paracetamol
description: Paracetamol is a widely used medication for reducing fever and relieving mild to moderate pain.

name: Diclofenac Plus
description: Diclofenac Plus is an anti-inflammatory medicine used to treat pain and inflammation in conditions such as arthritis and musculoskeletal disorders.

name: Azithromycin
description: Azithromycin is an antibiotic used to treat a variety of bacterial infections, including respiratory and skin infections.

name: Zerodol-P
description: Zerodol-P is a combination medicine used for pain relief, especially in cases of osteoarthritis and rheumatoid arthritis.

name: Zerodol-SP
description: Zerodol-SP is a combination medicine used for common pain relief.
